readable.title: 3529721084_4b405baf54
readable.content: A leather clad biker wearing face-paint sits on his motorcycle next to another biker who is standing beside his bike on a city street . Two bikers , one with a mask , pose in the street with their bikes . Two bikers pose for a picture , one of which is wearing a skull mask . Two men pose with their motorcycles . Two motorcyclists are standing on the side of the road and one is wearing a skull mask .
